title: Cloning: Alerts cloned when cloning databases or schemas | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2023_06 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

In the current Snowflake release, when you clone a database or schema, any Snowflake alerts in that database or
schema will also be cloned:
When you clone a database or schema, any alerts in that database or schema are not cloned.
When you clone a database or schema, any alerts in that database or schema will be cloned.
